snippet: The private equity firm Thomas H. Lee Partners announced on Tuesday that it would buy a majority stake in the party goods retailer Party City in a deal valued at $2.69 billion.
abstract: The private equity firm Thomas H. Lee Partners announced on Tuesday that it would buy a majority stake in the party goods retailer Party City in a deal valued at $2.69 billion.

headline.main: Thomas H. Lee Takes Stake in Party City in $2.69 Billion Deal
